name: Ghost Coast
instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients over ice and shake
2. Strain into a rocks glass over ice and garnish
description: An unforgettable tour of western America in cocktail form
garnish: eucalyptus leaf and/or banana chip for garnish

ingredients.name: Tequila Reposado
ingredients.description:
Tequila Reposado is a type of tequila that has been aged or "rested" in oak barrels for a specific period, giving it a mellower and more complex flavor compared to Tequila Blanco (unaged tequila). The term "reposado" translates to "rested" in Spanish.

Reposado occupies a middle ground between the youthful vibrancy of Blanco tequila and the more mature and complex characteristics of Añejo tequila. It appeals to those who appreciate a balance of agave flavor and the influence of oak aging.

ingredients.name: Tequila Blanco
ingredients.description:
Tequila is a distilled alcoholic beverage made from the fermented juice of the blue agave plant, primarily grown in the Jalisco region of Mexico. The production of tequila is regulated by Mexican law, specifying the geographical areas where it can be produced and the methods used in its production.

Tequila Blanco, also known as Tequila Silver or Tequila Plata, is a type of tequila that is typically unaged or aged for a very short period. It is the purest expression of the blue agave flavor, as it is not influenced by the characteristics of aging in oak barrels.

Blanco tequila is a popular choice for those who want to experience the true essence of the agave plant without the influence of aging. It provides a lively and authentic representation of tequila's primary ingredient.

ingredients.name: Crème de banane
ingredients.description: Perfectly ripened bananas are small-batch distilled to extract the rich banana flavor and natural amber color

ingredients.name: Honey Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made from dissolving honey in water.

ingredients.name: Maple syrup
ingredients.description: Maple syrup is a syrup made from the sap of maple trees.

ingredients.name: Angostura aromatic bitters
ingredients.description:
Angostura bitters is a concentrated bitters (herbal alcoholic preparation) and highly aromatic flavoring agent used in the preparation of cocktails and various culinary applications. It is a dark brown liquid made from a secret blend of herbs and spices, created by the House of Angostura in Trinidad and Tobago. Despite its name, Angostura bitters does not contain angostura bark; instead, it features a proprietary combination of botanical ingredients.

Angostura bitters typically comes in small bottles with a distinctive oversized label and a built-in dasher top, allowing for controlled and precise pouring.

Despite the name, Angostura bitters is non-alcoholic in the sense that it is not consumed in large quantities and is used as a flavoring agent rather than a beverage on its own.

Angostura bitters has become an iconic and essential ingredient in the world of cocktails, appreciated for its ability to elevate and enhance the overall drinking experience.
